entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 7.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hamilton Munro Int'l Airport 2:00 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: 7.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 90 %
Dewpoint: 6.3°C
Wind: WNW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
